PRISMA2020 0.0.1
  • Reference

Save PRISMA2020 flow diagram

PRISMA_save.Rd

Save the output from PRISMA_flowdiagram() to the working directory.

PRISMA_save(plotobj, filename = "PRISMA2020_flowdiagram.html", filetype = NA)

Arguments

plotobj

A plot produced using PRISMA_flowdiagram().
filename

The filename to save (including extension)
filetype

The filetype to save the plot in, supports: HTML, PDF, PNG, SVG, PS and WEBP (if NA, the filetype will be calculated out based on the file extension) HTML files maintain hyperlinks and tooltips

Value

the absolute filename of the saved diagram plot.

Examples

if (FALSE) {
data <- read.csv(file.choose());
data <- read_PRISMAdata(data);
attach(data); 
plot <- PRISMA_flowdiagram(data,
                fontsize = 12,
                interactive = TRUE,
                previous = TRUE,
                other = TRUE)
PRISMA_save(plot)
}
